ZDO_MatchDescReq_t Struct Reference

ZDO Match Descriptor request primitive allows to find remote devices supporting a specific simple descriptor match criterion. More...

Data Fields

uint8_t numOutClusters
ClusterId_t outClusterList [MAX_REQUESTED_CLUSTER_NUMBER]

Detailed Description

ZDO Match Descriptor request primitive allows to find remote devices supporting a specific simple descriptor match criterion.

Conforms to ZigBee spec r17 Table 2.50 page 105.

Definition at line 529 of file zdo.h.

Field Documentation

ShortAddr_t ZDO_MatchDescReq_t::nwkAddrOfInterest

NWK address for the request.

Definition at line 532 of file zdo.h.

ProfileId_t ZDO_MatchDescReq_t::profileId

Profile ID to be matched at the destination.

Definition at line 534 of file zdo.h.

uint8_t ZDO_MatchDescReq_t::numInClusters

The number of Input Clusters provided for matching within the InClusterList.

Definition at line 536 of file zdo.h.

ClusterId_t ZDO_MatchDescReq_t::inClusterList[MAX_REQUESTED_CLUSTER_NUMBER]

List of Input ClusterIDs to be used for matching; the InClusterList is the desired list to be matched by the Remote Device (the elements of the InClusterList are the supported output clusters of the Local Device).

Definition at line 540 of file zdo.h.

uint8_t ZDO_MatchDescReq_t::numOutClusters

The number of Output Clusters provided for matching within OutClusterList.

Definition at line 542 of file zdo.h.

ClusterId_t ZDO_MatchDescReq_t::outClusterList[MAX_REQUESTED_CLUSTER_NUMBER]

List of Output ClusterIDs to be used for matching; the OutClusterList is the desired list to be matched by the Remote Device (the elements of the OutClusterList are the supported input clusters of the Local Device).

Definition at line 546 of file zdo.h.
